title: NYC Complaints
text: dataset comes CouncilStat, used many NYC Council district offices enter track constituent cases can range issues around affordable housing, potholes pedestrian safety. dataset aggregates information individual staff input. However, district staffs handle wide range complex issues. offices uses program differently, thus records cases, differently comparisons accounts may difficult. offices use program. info - http://labs.council.nyc/districts/data/ teaching package; data clean—particular spurious zip codes complaints data, well issues. Data sourced NYC Open Data package also includes nyc_zips census_vars. former table NYC zip codes. latter table names ACS variables.

title: Complaints to NYC Council Constituent Services — nycomplaints
Complaints to NYC Council Constituent Services — nycomplaints
text: data frame 341,299 rows 11 variables: unique_key character Complaint identifier. account character NYC Council District created casework, may district constituent lives . opendate date Date casework created staff. closedate date Close Date date casework closed. casework closed issue resolved action taken. complaint_type character Broader category designated staff constituent casework. complaint_type corresponds NYC Council Legislative Committees. descriptor character Specific category designated staff constituent casework. zip integer Zip code constituent. borough character Borough constituent. city character City constituent. council_dist Council District constituent. community_board Community Board constituent.
